title: v1.2.0 — Computed Intelligence v2 (Tier 2)
items: Added 5 multi-API computed tools (31 total): page_health_dashboard, indexing_health_report, serp_feature_tracking, cannibalization_resolver, drop_alerts
page_health_dashboard — unified report combining URL Inspection + Search Analytics + PageSpeed Insights + CrUX per URL, with partial-failure tolerance via Promise.allSettled
indexing_health_report — batch-check indexing status for top analytics pages or sitemaps, rate-limited at 1 req/sec, aggregates by coverageState
serp_feature_tracking — searchAppearance dimension over time with daily trends per SERP feature type
cannibalization_resolver — detects keyword cannibalization and recommends redirect/consolidate/differentiate actions per competing URL
drop_alerts — flags pages with configurable % traffic drops (default 50%) in recent vs prior period
89 passing tests across 4 test files

title: Harden Tier 1 tools (review fixes)
items: Added withPermissionFallback to addSite/deleteSite for URL normalization consistency
Updated CrUX metrics: interaction_to_next_paint (stable), dropped first_input_delay, added round_trip_time/navigation_types/form_factors
Made CrUX schemas independent objects to prevent mutation bugs
Added .url() validation to Indexing API schemas
Added classifyError wrapping to all new service methods for consistent error types
62 passing tests (8 new)

title: v1.1.0 — Adjacent Google APIs (Tier 1)
items: Added 9 new tools (26 total): get_site, add_site, delete_site, mobile_friendly_test, pagespeed_insights, indexing_publish, indexing_status, crux_query, crux_history
Google Indexing API — publish URL update/delete notifications (200/day quota)
PageSpeed Insights — Lighthouse scores + CrUX field data per URL (free, no auth)
Chrome UX Report — Core Web Vitals by URL or origin, plus 40-week history trends
Complete sites CRUD (get, add, delete alongside existing list)
Mobile-friendly test with optional screenshot capture
Optional GOOGLE_CLOUD_API_KEY env var for CrUX tools (server works without it)
54 passing tests

title: v1.0.0 — Clean TypeScript rewrite with computed intelligence
items: Clean TypeScript rewrite of all 8 original tools from mcp-server-gsc
Added delete_sitemap tool (missing from original)
Added 7 computed intelligence tools: compare_periods, detect_content_decay, detect_cannibalization, diff_keywords, batch_inspect, ctr_analysis, search_type_breakdown
Added dataState param for fresh data access
Added discover and googleNews search types
Added flexible date ranges (days param as alternative to startDate/endDate)
Added auto-retry with exponential backoff on 429/5xx
Added custom error types (GSCAuthError, GSCQuotaError, GSCPermissionError)
Added auto-pagination utility for >25K rows
31 passing tests (schema validation + computed logic)

title: Published v1.0.0 to npm
items: Published mcp-server-gsc-pro@1.0.0 to npm
Updated vps-site .mcp.json to use mcp-server-gsc-pro
